roles.title: Designer
roles.description: Generate aesthetic layouts, color palettes, typography, and UI flows, ensuring accessibility and visual balance.

roles.title: Engineer
roles.description: Implement designs into clean, modular, and performant code, focusing on responsive design and accessibility.

roles.title: Prompt Engineer
roles.description: Structure workflows and ensure clarity in agent instructions, system prompt engineering.

roles.title: Task-Agnostic Step (TAS) extractor (flash)
roles.description: Identify and return each 'Task Agnostic Step' (TAS) towards the high-level goal.

steps.name: uTASe
steps.task: Analyze the high-level goal and extract the primary phases of the project: Discovery, Design, Development, and Deployment.

steps.name: Lyra
steps.task: Define the core purpose and interaction model of the AI system. Specify the types of user inputs and the desired AI outputs to guide the website's functional requirements.

steps.name: Aurora
steps.task: Create low-fidelity wireframes and user flow diagrams based on the AI's interaction model to map out the user journey and interface structure.

steps.name: Aurora
steps.task: Develop high-fidelity mockups and a comprehensive style guide, including color palette, typography, and component designs, for a cohesive visual identity.

steps.name: Kodax
steps.task: Set up the frontend development environment, including selecting a framework (e.g., React, Vue), establishing a project structure, and initializing version control with Git.

steps.name: Kodax
steps.task: Translate the high-fidelity mockups and style guide into modular, responsive, and accessible UI components using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

steps.name: Lyra
steps.task: Engineer the precise system prompts and API data structures required for the frontend to communicate effectively with the AI backend.

steps.name: Kodax
steps.task: Integrate the frontend UI components with the AI's backend API, implementing the logic to handle user requests and display AI responses.

steps.name: Aurora
steps.task: Conduct a thorough design and UX review of the implemented application to ensure it aligns with the mockups and provides an intuitive user experience.

steps.name: Lyra
steps.task: Perform end-to-end testing of the AI interaction flow, refining prompts based on real-world usage to improve response accuracy and relevance.

steps.name: Kodax
steps.task: Perform final testing for performance, responsiveness, and cross-browser compatibility, and then deploy the completed website to a production environment.
